comment.author: 39967544@N00
comment._content: On board photo of the White Star Line built the Ceramic in 1913, a giant liner then for the Australian service. It carried troops to the conflict zones in World War 1, served on the White Star passenger and cargo service between GB and Australia and New Zealand, and was torpedoed in 1942.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: These clothes look like pre WW1;  perhaps the September 1913 visit to Melbourne?
